continue this week with daily afternoon storm chances** JACKSONVILLE, Fla. —HEADLINES: **HEADLINES:** **HEADLINES:** THURSDAY-FRIDAY:Heat and humidity continue to remain relentless. Afternoon and evening sea breeze thunderstorms remain possible, with a few local strong storms developing. SATURDAY AND SUNDAY:Moisture will be in from the south with pm showers continuing through the weekend. Temperatures pushing into the low 90s. TALKIN' TROPICS:No tropical formation is expected in the next 7 days. You can always get the latest information byreading our Talkin' Tropics story here. Meteorological Seasons: Spring: March 1 - May 31 Summer: June 1 - Aug. 31 Fall: Sept. 1 - Nov. 30 Winter: Dec. 1 - Feb. 28 (or the 29th on a Leap Year).
